headline: Is Progressive (PGR) Offering An Opportunity After A 16.2% One Year Share Price Decline?
summary: If you are wondering whether Progressive is fairly priced or offering value right now, this article will walk you through what the numbers are really saying about the stock. The share price last closed at US$202.60, with returns of 0.8% over the past week, a 5.8% decline over the last month, a 4.5% decline year to date and a 16.2% decline over the past year, while the 3-year and 5-year returns sit at 59.2% and 166.3% respectively. Recent headlines around Progressive have focused on its...
